name: Mahalaxmi Polymers
overview:
Established in the year 2002, at Bahadurgarh (Haryana, India) we, “Mahalaxmi Polymers”, are engaged in manufacturing, exporting and supplying highly attractive and comfortable range of Footwear such as School Shoes, Kids Sports Shoes, PT Shoes (Tennis) and Casual Men Shoes.

Products: Our offered range includes Zig Zag School Shoes, School Shoes, Boys School Shoes, Leather School Shoes, Designer School Shoe, Casual Men Shoes, Casual Zig Zag Men Shoes, etc.

Infrastructural Facilities: Our organization is backed by the state-of-the-art infrastructural facility for manufacturing our world class Footwear’s We have divided our infrastructure into various departments like production, quality control, sales and marketing, warehouse and logistics that are handled by our experienced professionals.

Quality Assurance: We offer our valuable clients a high quality range of Footwear’s that is manufactured using high grade rubber and advanced technology in our well-developed manufacturing unit. At our organization, the entire production process is strictly monitored by our team of quality analysts, who have an in-depth knowledge in this domain.

Why Us ?: We are a prominent entity engaged in providing qualitative range of footwear that stands high on the grounds of quality and reliability.
